title: Crockpot Chicken Thighs
directions: Line bottom of slow cooker with sliced onions. Top with potatoes and carrots.
Combine, broth, cooking wine, garlic, and thyme in small bowl. Pour over veggies.
Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat.
Mix together paprika, salt, and pepper in small dish. Rub over chicken and cook in skillet about 3-4 min. each side, until browned.
Place chicken on top of veggies and cook on low 4 hours.
